intro.text: The man seems annoyed by the presence of new rookies like you.

option.title: Boris
option.text: I'm looking for my brother, Boris Kravshenko, do you remember him?

option.title: Locked Gate
option.text: Could you open the gate for me?

response.text: You must be talking about some rookie who worked here. I deal with a dozen and one rookies a day, so I can't remember any body. Go talk to Dr. Sidorovich. By the way, If you don't see him around here, he's probably already dead.
Go on. The door is unlocked.
You can't go through yet. Go talk to Dr. Sidorovich, he's in the two storey house over there.
You see, we are in a bit of trouble here. We are forced to take advantage of rookies like you. Either you pay your way through or do some work for us.
